thread.title: BRIEF-FXCM Group Reports Monthly Metrics

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-FXCM Group Reports Monthly Metrics

organizations.name: brief-fxcm group reports monthly metrics feb

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) -
* FXCM GROUP REPORTS MONTHLY METRICS * ‍FXCM GROUP - CUSTOMER TRADING VOLUME OF $250 BILLION IN JANUARY 2018, 46% HIGHER THAN DECEMBER 2017 AND 1% LOWER THAN JANUARY 2017​
* ‍FXCM GROUP - AVERAGE CUSTOMER TRADING VOLUME PER DAY OF $11.4 BILLION IN JANUARY 2018, 27% HIGHER THAN DECEMBER 2017 AND 5% LOWER THAN JANUARY 2017 Source text for Eikon:
